code: import{AppStateActionTypes}from"./actionTypes";export var SetPageTitle=function SetPageTitle(title){return{type:AppStateActionTypes.SETPAGETITLE,payload:title};};export var SetPageUrl=function SetPageUrl(url){return{type:AppStateActionTypes.SETPAGEURL,payload:url};};export var SetMenuCollection=function SetMenuCollection(collection){return{type:AppStateActionTypes.SETMENUCOLLECTION,payload:collection};};export var SetMenu=function SetMenu(menu){return{type:AppStateActionTypes.SETMENU,payload:menu};};export var SetOriginalMenu=function SetOriginalMenu(menu){return{type:AppStateActionTypes.SETORIGINALMENU,payload:menu};};export var SetLogMessages=function SetLogMessages(messages){return{type:AppStateActionTypes.SETLOGMESSAGES,payload:messages};};export var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{pageTitle:state.pageTitle,url:state.url,cookingBook:state.cookingBook,logMessages:state.logMessages};};
